body_html: Hey @mkolod did 52ffc79 end up working out for you? It would be helpful to get feedback. Especially if you have time to review the BUILD file, in case there's some select() statements we forgot to write tuning those constants for various platforms.
body_text: Hey @mkolod did 52ffc79 end up working out for you? It would be helpful to get feedback. Especially if you have time to review the BUILD file, in case there's some select() statements we forgot to write tuning those constants for various platforms.
body: Hey @mkolod did https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/52ffc792fdef41de20ac60dc61d4e809d83b558d end up working out for you? It would be helpful to get feedback. Especially if you have time to review the BUILD file, in case there's some select() statements we forgot to write tuning those constants for various platforms.
